Package Assignment1

Class BankAccount

java.lang.Object
Assignment1.BankAccount
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChequingAccount, SavingAccount, TFSAccount
public class BankAccount extends Object
Bank Account Class Assignment 1 CP2561 Winter 2022

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BankAccount()
    constructor that creates a new bank account with a zero balance
    BankAccount(double balance)
    constructor to create an account with an initial starting balance if balance is not positive the account defaults to a balance of 0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deposit(double depositAmount)
    method that accepts an amount to be deposited in the account if deposit amount is larger or equal 0, add this amount to balance else print error message
    double
    getBalance()
    get the balance of account
    void
    transfer(BankAccount account, double amount)
    method that will transfer money from one bank account to another bank account, if the transfer amount is bigger than balance of transferred amount, print error message, else update account balance
    void
    withdraw(double withdrawAmount)
    method that accepts an amount to withdraw from the account if withdrawn amount is larger than account's balance, print error message else minus the withdrawn amount from account's balance

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      constructor that creates a new bank account with a zero balance

    • BankAccount

      public BankAccount(double balance)
      constructor to create an account with an initial starting balance if balance is not positive the account defaults to a balance of 0
      Parameters:

    • getBalance

      public double getBalance()
      get the balance of account
      Returns:
      balance of account

    • deposit

      public void deposit(double depositAmount)
      method that accepts an amount to be deposited in the account if deposit amount is larger or equal 0, add this amount to balance else print error message
      Parameters:
      depositAmount - (double) amount to deposit

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw(double withdrawAmount)
      method that accepts an amount to withdraw from the account if withdrawn amount is larger than account's balance, print error message else minus the withdrawn amount from account's balance
      Parameters:
      withdrawAmount - (double) amount to withdraw

    • transfer

      public void transfer(BankAccount account, double amount)
      method that will transfer money from one bank account to another bank account, if the transfer amount is bigger than balance of transferred amount, print error message, else update account balance
      Parameters:
      account - (Bankaccount object)
      amount - (double) amount to transfer
